review.title: “Good Company”
review.pros: Pros – The company overall is great to work for...excellent health and 401K benefits, competitive salary, and generally the people are great to work with.
review.cons: Cons – The owner is very knowledgeable and does not allow middle management to make decisions without his input.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Trust that your employees are working in your best interest.

review.title: “Heavy Focus on Customer”
review.pros: Pros – High demand for product, so there is a lot of work
review.cons: Cons – Long hours, last minute production changes, poor communication of expectations, lack of training, lack of promotion opportunities
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Value your employees more. Don't treat them like expendable cogs.
